LevelUpNotice: As your HQ level increases, softcap limit increases, and crafting of new equipment becomes possible.
Name: Name
MenuKancolleDesc: Opens the KC3改 tab, where you can customize the DMM game page.
MenuStrategyDesc: Various tools that help you analyze, strategize for and manage your fleet.
MenuSettingsDesc: Various extension configurations that will apply after reloading the game.
MenuAboutDesc: Information on KC3改 and its developers, translators and testers.
GameHotkeyHUD: Hold to show KC3改 Special HUD
GameHotkeyType: Get 20 seconds of keyboard typing time
GameAltDMMInfo: If you're here, you're already set to play via the DMM website. This is our recommended mode. Don't worry— it has subtitles, translations, and backgrounds. Just proceed as instructed in the 'Start the Game' section.
GameAltFrameInfo: In some Chrome versions (55+), the DMM Frame doesn't render. It only shows a black screen, but you can hear sounds.
GameAltAPIInfo: In some Chrome versions (55+), the API Link is not detected by the panel. It gets stuck at 'Waiting for game actions...'
GameAltIgnore: I am aware that this may not work, but I still want to open it.
GameStep2: In the DevTools panel that opened, click on the KanColle tab. Check the » pull-down menu if it's not visible.
GameStepHintRam: To reduce RAM usage, switch to the Network tab, click the red 🔴 button or press Ctrl E in order to stop the recording log.
GameDMMRedirect: You will be redirected to play directly on DMM website
GameDMMFrame: This will open the DMM KanColle page in an iFrame
GameAPIRemoveDesc: If in any case you want to remove the saved API Link from this extension:
GameAPINoExist: You have do not have any recorded API Link
GameAPIGetTitle: To get a new API link
GameAPIGetDesc: Use the Refresh API Link from the KC3改 menu at the top-right of your browser.
GameAPIExistDesc: If you already have an API Link on hand, you may input it here:
GameAPIWhatDesc: These are direct URLs to your game, recognized as or associated with your account. As long as you carry this link, you are automatically "logged-in" and can then bypass login via DMM, therefore eliminating the need to go through VPN each time you open the game.
GameAPIRemindDesc: Do not use KC3改 while you have not yet passed through the lottery process. This viewer assumes that the account being logged-in while extracting API Links is already playable. Once you have joined a server, you will also need to input your admiral name while not in API link.
GameAPIAltDesc: If you do not prefer API links and desire to play KanColle naturally on DMM portal, the Play on DMM Website from the KC3改 menu also supports the F12 panel with the same startup mechanics as this.
GameAPIExpiredAlert: Your current API session has been expired
GameAPIExpiredExplanation:
KC3改 detects that your current API link either have been requested about 20 minutes ago or it have been used previously. Also, to make sure that you didn't access this tab directly with expired API link.
You may need to refresh your current API either via Popup menu or this button...
GameStartDashTitle: To start the game with Admiral Dashboard
GameStartDashDesc: To start your game and get critical information on your HQ and fleet statuses, you can open the Admiral Dashboard. This will show you information such as HQ Rank, Ship slots, Equipment LoS, Air Fighter Power, Fleet Speed, Morale, etc. You may activate this via:
GameStartDashChrome: When the devtools panel opens, there will be a tab "KanColle", click on it. If there're too many tabs, it may be hidden in » pull-down menu at rightmost, check it.
GameStartNowDesc: If you want to opt out of all those features and just want to start the game now... (be enabled via Settings)
AboutPartnerZHKcWikiDesc: Simplified Chinese quest translations and subtitle quotes
AboutPartnerPoiStatsDesc: Intergration of the submission of reports of API Data
AboutPartnerWhoCallsDesc: Internal ship database that we use in various areas in the app
AboutPartnerKCCalcDesc: Integration for exporting the fleet information into their fleet builder
AboutPartnerKCTHFBDesc: TH translations of the app, and KC3 update posts in Facebook
AboutSourceWhoCallsTheFleet: WhoCallsTheFleet for Strategy Room Ship Database
AboutSourceHeartSound: Hearbeat sound effect during taiha alert
AboutSampleBattleData: for sharing battle data for updates
AboutLoadingLicense: Loading contents of the license file...
SettingsCheckNewShipFromDexTip: In order to highlight dropped or built ship girl faces that you don't already own, we need to access all pages of the in-game Ship Library once to gather relevant data. If we do not check it via the Library, ships that have been fed, scrapped or sunk are still considered to be new ships.
SettingsPowerCriticalTip: Critical power will not be available if Post-cap above is not enabled.
SettingsSSDirDesc: This sets a target location within your browser's /Download/ directory for the downloaded file. Subdirectories can be assigned, but absolute paths, empty paths and paths containing back-references ('..') will produce an error. The location of the /Download/ directory itself is determined by your browser's settings.
SettingsIdleWarnDesc: Time in seconds before idle screen shows, 0 for disable.
SettingsFocusGameTabTip: This option shifts focus to the game window both when the first damage cut-in of a battle occurs and when a battle has ended. Please note that it will only work when the in-game home port sound option 'SE' is enabled. This option will still work if the game is muted out of game, such as by using the KC3 panel's mute toggle or by muting the browser's tab.
SubtitleDisplayBottom: (Bottom) Fixed on bottom of game screen
SubtitleDisplayBelow: (Below) Fixed right below the game screen
SubtitleDisplayStick: (Stick) Fixed on the bottom of browser window
SubtitleDisplayEvade: (Evade) Bottom of game screen, moves to top on hover
SubtitleDisplayGhost: (Ghost) Bottom of game screen, ghost mode on hover
SettingsDMMCustomCSSTip: Valid CSS3 declarations. Don't change this if you are not familiar with CSS and DMM sources. To see changes, reload DMM game page. Don't forget that sometimes `!important` is needed to overwrite defaults.
SettingsPanelColorTip: The default format uses rgba(red (0-255), green (0-255), blue(0-255), opacity(0.00-1.00)). Setting the fourth number (opacity) to 0 will disable the color.
SettingsPanelCustomCSSTip: Valid CSS3 declarations. Don't change this if you are not familiar with CSS and KC3 sources. Changes will be applied immediately on this field saved. Don't forget that sometimes `!important` is needed to overwrite defaults.
SettingsPanelPvPFriendsTip: List of user names of friends to be highlighted in PvP panel. Names should be seperated with lines. You can also click on a name in the PvP panel to toggle friend highlighting for that player.
SettingsPanelReloadReminderStartTip: Show a reminder after specific time to reopen Chrome devtools panels in order to release memory taken by game tab process. 0 = disable
SettingsPanelReloadReminderStartRepeatTi: Show the reminder every specific time after first one, 0 = only once
SettingsChuuiWarningDangerousFeature:
Are you sure that you really want to change this?
Any risks that you're attempting is beyond KC3改's responsibility.

Make sure you're know what to do before.
SettingsStrategyCustomCSSTip: Valid CSS3 declarations. Don't change this if you are not familiar with CSS and KC3 sources. To see changes, reload Strategy Room page. Don't forget that sometimes `!important` is needed to overwrite defaults.
SettingsSaveSortieToDbTip: Don't disable this if you don't want your Maps / Events History miss your battle data. Disabling this will also make Ledger can not search your sortie related consumptions by maps.
SettingsSaveSortieButMapsTip: Set a list to exclude maps from saving sortie battle data. Format: [map ID1, map ID2, ...]. For example: [11,15,54] means do not save data sortied to 1-1, 1-5, 5-4. Will not save any map if previous option disabled.
SettingsSavePvpToDbTip: Don't disable this if you don't want your PvP Battle History miss your data.
SettingsConsoleLogHooksTip: Stop KC3's internal logging from watching chrome's console methods. This option is primarily for developers; generally, it should remain unticked.
SettingsLogKeepDurationTip: Specify the amount of time after which regular logs (log, debug, info) will be automatically discarded.
SettingsErrorKeepDurationTip: Specify the amount of time after which error logs (warn, error) will be automatically discarded.
InstalledText: Thank you for installing KC3改! We hope that these tools can help you play KanColle and make it a better experience! Do not hesitate to approach us if you need help. Check the about page to know where we can be reached.
UpdatedText: If you are currently playing KanColle, some features in the viewer might be bugged. Please close the game tab and restart the game. If you are in the middle of a sortie, please finish it first, but know what some features such as info and prediction might not work as expected before restarting.
UpdateNotifText:
Update ready. Extension reload required.
Click here to open the update page.
PageUpdateReadyText: An extension update is ready to be installed. You may opt to restart now , or finish what you're doing in-game and restart later. Please note that if you choose to restart now, the game tab might automatically close, and the devtools panel will get an error until reloaded.
UnwantedExit: API Links expire after one use. You will need to 'Refresh API Link' again through the menu if you're going to refresh, otherwise, you will just get catbombs!
UnwantedExitDMM: You're leaving the page as well as your girls! However, if you're only refreshing, it'll be a healthy refresh and won't give you catbombs. API Links are irrelevant!
APIConcealExpl: Hover to show your API Link
GameUpdateDetected: An update to the game has been detected!
GameUpdateBoth: {0} new ship(s) or CG(s) and {1} new piece(s) of equipment detected!
GameUpdateLink: Click here to learn more about this in the Strategy Room!
BossDebuffedTitle: A mechanism change has been detected!
BossDebuffedMessage: A change in event map mechanics has been detected. {0}
CatBombServerCommErrorMsg: [{0}] failed to communicate with the server. This was most likely a connectivity error and is unrelated to your API link.
CatBombHardAPIErrorMsg: The server responded with an error for your API calls. Either you're using an expired API link or the game is under maintenance. Try refreshing your API link or checking the wikia for notices.
CatBombWrongComputerClockMsg: Please update your computer's clock. While you don't need to set it to Japan's timezone, it needs to be correct for your local timezone! Your clock is off by {0} minutes.
CatBombErrorOnHomePortTitle: Error when entering Home Port screen
CatBombAPIDataErrorMsg: The most recent action completed the network communication with the server, but it returned an error. Check if the game is under maintenance or if your API link is still working.
CatBombMissingServerTimeMsg: There's something wrong with the communication to the server (or with your proxy). Make sure your computer's clock is correct or else problems will occur.
APIErrorNoticeTitle: KC3改 encountered an error with game data.
APIErrorNoticeMessage: It seems there was an error when we tried to handle the game data for {0}. The game API might have changed, so some features may be broken or inaccurate
Bomb201Message: An Error 201 from the game API has occured. This may be because you're still logged in on another game client or it may be related to macro detection. Exercise caution if you see this repeatedly.
TsunDBTestInactiveMessage: Thank you for your help! The test you are contributing towards has received enough samples.
TsunDBTestLink: Click here to check out other avaliable tests
TsunDBTestWrongMoraleMessage: Please check the morale requirements for this test and ensure you are within the bounds before sortie.
TsunDBTestWrongSetupMessage: Please ensure you have met the required ship level, equipped only test related equipment and met the accuracy requirements (if any). This test may also require you to update to the latest version of KC3Kai.
BackupReminderMessage: It has been {0} days since your last backup.
BackupReminderLink: Click here to backup your data
PanelReloadReminderMessage:
Please restart your game ASAP or it might crash 😥
Protip: you may just close devtools panel first; go to docking in-game; then reopen devtools and back to home port.
PanelReloadReminderLink: Click here to change reminder settings
HQRankPointsTip: Accumulated HQ exp. points since the last cut-off on {0:dateTime}

PanelFormationTip: . The formation selected is used in a variety of calculations, namely in the Fleet Anti-Air stat and the panel's ship icon mouseover stat sheet.
PanelCombinedFSChuuhaTip: Flagship is Chuuha or Taiha and can't sortie next time!

UntranslatedQuestTip: This is an unidentified or untranslated quest. It cannot be shown here, so please visit the quest page in-game to view.
PanelErrorStorage: Your Chrome's localStorage is disabled in your settings. KC3改 needs this feature. See how to enable this.
